comment._content: US Ambassador to the Ottoman Empire (and grandfather of historian Barbara Tuchman, btw): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henry_Morgenthau,_Sr.

comment._content: I didn't know that. Bless Barbara Tuchman and all her works. Her books are fascinating. Egad, she was good!
